title: The Easiest Way to Turn Off a CT-512 Calculator

steps.title: Press รท.
steps.content: Press รท . You'll see the "Divide" button on the right side of the calculator next to the number pad. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Press x.
steps.content: Press x . You'll see the "Multiply" button on the right side of your calculator next to the number pad. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Press %.
steps.content: Press % . You'll see the "Percentage" button on the right side of your calculator next to the number pad. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Press Check.
steps.content: Press Check . The "Check" button is in the top left corner of your calculator. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Press Correct.
steps.content: Press Correct . It's the button that says "Correct x" and "Delete" next to the "Check" button. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Press Correct again.
steps.content: Press Correct again. After pressing it a second time, your calculator will turn off. [6] X Research source
